root: ^Bernadette is sitting in the chair, upright, her legs dangling from the side. You frown – there's a special, cleverly designed footrest, made with care, engineered with customers in mind. Bernadette has used it before; she must remember how comfortable it feels. But her fingers are tapping on the phone, and her heels are still on, and she looks up at you only when you politely clear your throat.
^"Ah, yes, hi. I wanted to lodge a complaint. How do I do that?"
^You wince. You need the manager for that. And you really do not want to call the manager. While you were thinking, Bernadette had already returned to typing.

s: ^"Oh, is there something wrong with the treatment?"
^"I can call my manager, miss. But maybe you can tell me what's the problem, and I might be able to fix it."

something: ^"Well, that last treatment didn't work at all. And I knew something was up – I didn't even fall asleep, like I always do, remember?"
assure: ^"No, it's just –", she realizes that she interrupted you mid-sentence and pauses, tearing her eyes from the phone. "Sorry. I'm sorry. It's just that I'm just as irritable as I was before. I was a mess in front of my friends, I was a bitch to Jake," she shakes her phone, emphasizing the point, "Now I'm rude to you."

s: ^"I'm so sorry to hear that! Can I help somehow?"
^"I don't know if that's a reason to worry yet, sounds like you just had a rough day."

new_treatment: ^"Well, I still want the procedure. But could you make sure it really packs a punch this time? I heard you have stronger options?"
skip_1: ^Though there are only two with calming rating higher than her last one. You pick the weaker of the two, for now, and get your tools ready. Bernadette finally lies down and exhales.

^First the primer, then the skin protection, then the gel. Bernadette's brows finally unfurrow, and she mumbles something about the frown line, dozing off. You're on the second layer of the cream when you are interrupted by insistent buzzing – and Bernadette's eyes shoot open. She looks at you with a question.
phone_convo: ^"Yeah, I'm at the spa", she says, and puts the phone on speaker, letting her hand fall back to the side.
^"Okay, baby, just checking! God knows you needed some rest. You filed that refund for last time yet?"
^"No, no, sorry, but I'm here with... with the aesthe...tician, I can…" under your fingers, she falls asleep again.

s: ^"She is, sir. I can hang up the call."

jake_asshole: ^"Yeah, sure. And for the love of God don't give her that weak shit again."

s: ^"We won't, thank you for your concern!"
^"In my professional opinion, I think it worked well for her."

nice: ^"Nice. Just make sure it packs a punch. I told her, 'Bernie, they give you the weak shit'."
whatever: ^"Whatever. Just make sure it packs a punch. I told her, 'Bernie, they give you the weak shit'."
jake_continue: ^"I almost envy you. Must be nice. Most of the time you're with Bernie she's either right after her mask or silent."
^"Do you get it? You don't have to deal with what comes next, and I do, so make sure you do your job right."

s: ^He hangs up, before you can answer.

pause: ^Bernadette wakes up with a radiant smile, and you can't help but return it. She hops up from the chair.
^"You did it again, you sorcerer. Thank you!"

s: ^You wave her goodbye without mentioning Jake. Why risk ruining that mood they paid for.
^Already at the door, you say you shared a few words with Jake.

avoid: ^You return to your desk. It's good to know you've helped a couple.
share: ^Her smile wavers, but remains in place. "Oh, Jake, he can be a bit intense, but it's only because he worries a lot, and with good reason. Don't pay it any mind," she replies.
crossroads: ^You stand there, at the edge of your spa, without your supplies, your white coat, your gloves.

s: ^"Of course. If love was easy, it wouldn't be love," you chuckle.
^"I think he shouldn't talk about you this way."

dodge: ^You return to your desk. You hope Bernie's anxiety gets better.
defend: ^Why the hell did you just say that?
